RSVP_Text: Please fill out the form below whether you are coming or not, no later than May 8, 2025.
VenueContent_text: The ceremony and the reception will be at this location.
MiddleBlockContent_text: On Pentecost Sunday at 16:00, the welcoming of guests begins at Gúthi Hunting Lodge. The ceremony and reception will be held at the same place.
OtherContent_section2_content: The most important gift for us is that you celebrate with us. If you'd like to contribute further, please bring something that fits in an envelope.
OtherContent_section3_content: Click HERE for the wedding YouTube playlist. Add your own songs too, the ones that will definitely get you on the dance floor!
